title: Transformers for Time Series Forecasting
abstract: We explore transformer architectures for multi-horizon time series forecasting and compare them with classical baselines.

title: Efficient Graph Neural Networks on Large-Scale Data
abstract: This paper presents scalable GNN techniques using subgraph sampling and memory-efficient training strategies.

title: Retrieval-Augmented Generation for Scientific QA
abstract: We evaluate RAG pipelines for domain-specific scientific question answering with ablation on retrieval depth and reranking.

title: AI in Healthcare
abstract: This study explores AI applications in diagnosis and treatment planning.

title: Neural Networks in Cardiology
abstract: We analyze neural networks for heart disease detection and prediction.

title: Blockchain in Supply Chain
abstract: Exploring blockchain's role in enhancing transparency and efficiency in supply chains.

title: Climate Change Impact on Agriculture
abstract: An overview of climate change effects on global food production.

title: Quantum Computing for Cryptography
abstract: Evaluating quantum algorithms for secure encryption and decryption methods.

title: Renewable Energy Storage Solutions
abstract: A comprehensive review of battery technologies for renewable energy storage.

title: Machine Learning in Finance
abstract: Application of supervised and unsupervised learning techniques in financial risk assessment.

title: Deep Sea Exploration Technologies
abstract: Innovations in robotics and AI for deep-sea environmental monitoring.

title: Augmented Reality in Education
abstract: Assessing the effectiveness of AR tools in improving student engagement and retention.

title: Space-Based Solar Power Systems
abstract: Feasibility study of harnessing solar energy from space and transmitting it to Earth.
